page.title: 06HOME LIFE -FIVE
page.content: From our questionnaire we found that as expected dogs and cats were the most popular pets in our area. Other pets owned by people in our district were rabbits, hamsters, tortoises, birds- includes canaries, budgerigars, doves, and a finch- guinea pigs, mice, gerbils. The number of goldfish kept was the most but 56 of the goldfish out of 65 were owned by just two people. A tradition of this area is the racing of pigeons. Two people out of over one hundred said they had racing pigeons.Recently many people have started to keep more exotic pets but from our survey we found only two.Both spiders one was a red knee and the other a tarantula!
